title: aravindha padhamalar
sahitya:
aravinda padamalar nOgumO (unran) aDimai enakkirangi AtkoLLa vandiDil

anupallavi

viraindu tiraikaDal kaDandu arakkanin Iraindu shiram koNDa rAghavanE
unran

caraNam

kuraL vaDivAi vandu IrEzhulagaLandAi caraNamadAl kanni shApamum
tIrttAi aravak-koDiyOniDam

aivarukkAga shenrAi karuNAnidhiyun tirunAmam shollik-kanindu meiyurugiDa
azhaittiDum enakkenil
